name: irrelevant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not related to what is being discussed or considered and therefore not important: These documents are largely irrelevant to the present investigation. Making a large profit is irrelevant to us - the important thing is to make the book available to the largest possible audience. Opposite
relevant

not related to what is being discussed or considered: These documents are totally irrelevant to the investigation. irrelevance noun [ C/U ] us/ɪˈrel·ə·vəns/ (also irrelevancy, us/ɪˈrel·ə·vən·si/)
Many of these problems may simply fade into irrelevance when the new rules come into force.
